name: Tug-A-War
description: A type-in BASIC strategy game for two players.  The game board consists of a row of colored squares, with the players' home squares on both ends, and a ball at the center.  Each side's goal is to get the ball to their home square.  Taking turns, the players flip a number of squares to change their colors: the four possible colors move the ball one or two steps in each direction - when the square at the ball's position is flipped, the ball will move accordingly.
alsoFor: Amiga, Apple II, Atari ST, Commodore 64, DOS, TI-99/4A | Combined View

shot.caption: No way out for Blue, it seems
